🎮 1v1.LOL Unblocked Extension 🔫

Master your shooting and building skills with the 1v1.LOL Unblocked extension for Chrome! Challenge players in real-time build battles and fast-paced shooting matches right from your browser.

Features:

🛠️ Combine shooting and building mechanics
🤖 Practice against AI or compete against real players
🏆 Climb the leaderboards and become the best
Installation Guide:

Click 'Add to Chrome' to install the extension.
Look for the 1v1.LOL icon in your Chrome toolbar once installed.
Simply click the icon to launch the game and start battling!
Uninstallation Guide:

Right-click the 1v1.LOL icon in your toolbar.
Select 'Remove from Chrome'.
Confirm by clicking 'Remove'.
Privacy Policy:
We value your privacy! To learn more about how we protect and use your data, please visit our privacy policy here: https://1v1lol.me/privacy-policy

🔧 Troubleshooting: If you experience any issues, try refreshing your browser or reinstalling the extension. For further help, please contact our support team.

Prepare for battle and showcase your skills in 1v1.LOL today! 🌟
